page.title: 03LANIVET C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: {In Lanivet School}there are sixty children and four teachers. Mrs. Springham is the headteacher and Mrs. Bishop is the deputy. There is Mr. Mitchelmore who is good at games and P.E. and Mrs. Keirle who is part-time. She helps two boys with their language work and also teaches Class 3 when Mrs. Springham has her office work to do. The school was built in{1905}and one of the earliest headmasters was Mr. Yates. In those days children were given prizes for good attendance. Our school has three classes. In CLASS 1(Infants) there are 26 - nine of these are part-time because they are not five years old yet.In CLASS 2 there are 18 top infants/lower juniors.In CLASS 3 there are 16 2nd/3rd/4th year juniors.
